languages.text: {n}Сильные руки воина, привыкшие к оружию, ложатся на клавиши органа с неожиданной чуткостью. Пальцы бегут по ним легкими и уверенными движениями, порождая мелодию одновременно могучую и полную сдержанной нежности, трепетного ожидания и пронзительного томления. На лице Соломона застыла задумчивая маска, а руки порхают, то нанося выверенные удары, то тревожа клавиши невесомыми прикосновениями.{/n}

{n}The fighter's strong hands, accustomed to holding a weapon, rest on the organ keys with unexpected delicacy. His fingers flit confidently over the keys, producing a melody at once vigorous and full of restrained tenderness, tremulous expectation, and searing yearning. Solomorne's face is frozen in a mask of contemplation, but his hands dance along the keys, alternating between weightless caresses and precise, bold strikes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сильные руки воина, привыкшие к оружию, ложатся на клавиши органа с неожиданной чуткостью. languages.text: {n}戦士のたくましい、武器を握ることに慣れたその手が、意外なほど繊細にオルガンの鍵盤の上に置かれた。彼の指は自信に満ちて鍵盤の上を舞い、力強さと抑えた優しさ、震えるような期待感、そして燃えるような憧憬を合わせ持つ旋律を紡ぎ出していく。ソロモーンの顔は深い沈思の仮面のように凍りついたままだが、彼の手は無重力の愛撫と、正確かつ大胆な打鍵とを交互に織り交ぜながら、鍵盤の上を舞い続けていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fighter's strong hands, accustomed to holding a weapon, rest on the organ keys with unexpected delicacy. languages.text: {n}Die starken Hände des Kämpfers, an Waffen gewöhnt, ruhen mit unerwarteter Zartheit auf den Orgeltasten. Seine Finger gleiten selbstbewusst darüber und bringen eine Melodie hervor, die lebendig ist, aber auch voller zurückhaltender Zärtlichkeit, bebender Erwartung und brennender Sehnsucht. Solomornes Gesicht ist eine starre Maske der inneren Einkehr, aber seine Hände tanzen über die Tasten, streicheln sie mal schwerelos und treffen sie dann mit präzisem, mutigen Druck.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fighter's strong hands, accustomed to holding a weapon, rest on the organ keys with unexpected delicacy. His fingers flit confidently over the keys, producing a melody at once vigorous and full of restrained tenderness, tremulous expectation, and searing yearning. Solomorne's face is frozen in a mask of contemplation, but his hands dance along the keys, alternating between weightless caresses and precise, bold strikes.{/n}

Solomornes Gesicht ist eine starre Maske der inneren Einkehr, aber seine Hände tanzen über die Tasten, streicheln sie mal schwerelos und treffen sie dann mit präzisem, mutigen Druck.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les mains musclées du combattant, habituées à tenir une arme, se posent sur les touches de l'orgue avec une délicatesse surprenante. Ses doigts parcourent les notes avec assurance, produisant une mélodie aussi enlevée qu'empreinte de tendresse contenue, d'anticipation fébrile et de désir ardent. Le visage de Solomorne est figé en un masque contemplatif, mais ses mains dansent littéralement sur le clavier, alternant effleurements caressants et frappes aussi précises que vigoureuses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fighter's strong hands, accustomed to holding a weapon, rest on the organ keys with unexpected delicacy. His fingers flit confidently over the keys, producing a melody at once vigorous and full of restrained tenderness, tremulous expectation, and searing yearning. Solomorne's face is frozen in a mask of contemplation, but his hands dance along the keys, alternating between weightless caresses and precise, bold strikes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mains musclées du combattant, habituées à tenir une arme, se posent sur les touches de l'orgue avec une délicatesse surprenante. Ses doigts parcourent les notes avec assurance, produisant une mélodie aussi enlevée qu'empreinte de tendresse contenue, d'anticipation fébrile et de désir ardent. Le visage de Solomorne est figé en un masque contemplatif, mais ses mains dansent littéralement sur le clavier, alternant effleurements caressants et frappes aussi précises que vigoureuses.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sus fuertes manos de guerrero, acostumbradas a empuñar un arma, reposan sobre las teclas del órgano con inusitada delicadeza. Sus dedos vuelan con confianza sobre las teclas, produciendo una melodía al mismo tiempo enérgica y rebosante de ternura reprimida, expectación trémula y voraz anhelo. El rostro de Solomorne presenta una expresión hierática y meditabunda, pero sus manos danzan sobre el teclado, alternando entre suaves caricias y pulsaciones más precisas y audaces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fighter's strong hands, accustomed to holding a weapon, rest on the organ keys with unexpected delicacy. His fingers flit confidently over the keys, producing a melody at once vigorous and full of restrained tenderness, tremulous expectation, and searing yearning. Solomorne's face is frozen in a mask of contemplation, but his hands dance along the keys, alternating between weightless caresses and precise, bold strikes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位战士惯于抓握武器的双手，此刻却落在了琴键上，以出人意料的细腻演奏起来。他的手指自信地在琴键上跳跃，奏出了一段充满活力的旋律，乐曲中充满了克制的温柔、颤抖的期待，以及炽热的渴望。索罗蒙的脸上没有任何表情，仿佛在沉思一般，但他的双手在琴键上舞动，时而轻盈地爱抚，时而精确、用力地敲击。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fighter's strong hands, accustomed to holding a weapon, rest on the organ keys with unexpected delicacy. His fingers flit confidently over the keys, producing a melody at once vigorous and full of restrained tenderness, tremulous expectation, and searing yearning. Solomorne's face is frozen in a mask of contemplation, but his hands dance along the keys, alternating between weightless caresses and precise, bold strikes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位战士惯于抓握武器的双手，此刻却落在了琴键上，以出人意料的细腻演奏起来。他的手指自信地在琴键上跳跃，奏出了一段充满活力的旋律，乐曲中充满了克制的温柔、颤抖的期待，以及炽热的渴望。索罗蒙的脸上没有任何表情，仿佛在沉思一般，但他的双手在琴键上舞动，时而轻盈地爱抚，时而精确、用力地敲击。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silaha alışkın kuvvetli elleri, orgun tuşlarına beklenmedik bir zarafetle konuyor. Parmakları, hem coşkulu hem şefkatli hem tutuk bir arzu taşıyan bir melodi çalıyor. Solomorne'un çehresi düşünceli bir maskeye benzese de elleri, zarif dokunuşlarla ve cüretkâr hareketlerle dans ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The fighter's strong hands, accustomed to holding a weapon, rest on the organ keys with unexpected delicacy. His fingers flit confidently over the keys, producing a melody at once vigorous and full of restrained tenderness, tremulous expectation, and searing yearning. Solomorne's face is frozen in a mask of contemplation, but his hands dance along the keys, alternating between weightless caresses and precise, bold strikes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Silaha alışkın kuvvetli elleri orgun tuşlarına beklenmedik bir zarafetle konar. Parmakları, hem coşkulu hem şefkatli hem tutuk bir arzu taşıyan bir melodi çalar. Solomorne'un çehresi düşünceli bir maskedir fakat elleri zarif dokunuşlarla cüretkâr hareketlerle dans eder.{/n}
